steps.title: Shower them with love and support to celebrate a century of life.
steps.content: Shower them with love and support to celebrate a century of life. Turning 100 is a momentous occasion, so share what the birthday boy or girl means to you to craft a heartwarming message. Here are some example wishes to congratulate them on such an impressive feat: Your life is a gift to us all. Happy 100th birthday! Celebrating 100 beautiful years of a life well-lived and a heart well-loved. Your presence has changed our lives for the better. Happy 100th birthday! You’ve made the world a better place for 100 years. Thank you for everything. 100 years of living with purpose, grace, and love. You are a true gift to the world. With 100 years behind you, your legacy of love will carry on for generations to come. Your love and kindness have touched countless lives. You are cherished beyond words. The world is so much more beautiful to have had you in it for 100 years. Happy birthday! Here’s to a century of love, laughter, and adventure…and to the inspiration you continue to be. In the story of your life, 100 is the chapter where it all makes perfect sense. Happy birthday! Your life has been a blessing to everyone who knows you. Happy 100th, and thank you for every moment. You’ve lived 100 years with a heart full of love and a spirit that shines. We are so blessed to know you. Wishing you continued peace, love, and happiness as you celebrate this beautiful milestone of 100 years. Your life has been a beautiful story of love, strength, and unwavering grace. We’re so lucky to be part of your journey. May your 100th birthday be filled with boundless love, light, and positivity. You deserve it more than anyone else in the world! I’m celebrating every one of the 100 years that have made you the smart, strong, and incredible person you are. Happy birthday! Your life has been a blessing not only to your family but to every person lucky enough to know you. Here’s to 100 years of love and light! Celebrating 100 years of life is such a privilege. I hope you know how loved and cherished you are by everyone around you. HBD! A century ago, the world was gifted with someone truly special. Today, we celebrate the beauty of your life and the joy you continue to bring. One hundred years of love, laughter, and memories—what an incredible journey it has been! Here’s to a lifetime of happiness with the ones you love! Happy 100th birthday. You have a gift for bringing out the best in people, and I am so grateful to know you. Here’s to another year of good health and happiness! Today, we celebrate not just your age but all the love, wisdom, and beautiful moments you’ve brought into the world. You’re a gift to everyone who knows you, and I’m so grateful to be part of your life. Happy 100th to someone who makes life better for everyone around them. Your strength, kindness, and patience are truly inspiring, and I hope today and every day is just as wonderful as you are. You deserve it! Words cannot describe the value you add to our lives. Thank you for all the love, care, and wisdom you’ve bestowed upon us. We want you to know that it does not go unnoticed, and we love you very much. Happy 100th birthday! Imaginative and intelligent. Full of warmth, care, and sound advice. A person who leads with love and isn’t afraid to stand up for what’s right. These are just some of the things I admire about you, and I’m so blessed to know you. I hope your 100th is one for the books!

steps.title: Honor their life and legacy with an inspirational birthday message.
steps.content: Honor their life and legacy with an inspirational birthday message. If you want to make the birthday boy or girl feel good on their 100th, sharing a message full of heart and admiration is the way to go. You could mention what an inspiration they’ve been to everyone around them or reassure them that the best is yet to come. Here are some encouraging words to make their birthday memorable: Thank you for inspiring us to live boldly and with love. HBD! May your story continue to inspire generations. Happy 100th! A century of wisdom and joy. You’ve lived an extraordinary life. Happy 100th birthday to an honest, humble, and inspiring person. You’ve taught us that age is no barrier to greatness. Happy 100th! Thank you for inspiring us to live fully, no matter what. Happy birthday! 100 years of making life beautiful. Thank you for inspiring us each day. 100 years of greatness…keep shining, inspiring, and living life to the fullest! You might be 100, but your spirit is ageless. Happy birthday to a true inspiration. Celebrating a century of courage, wisdom, and love. Your legacy will live on forever. Your 100-year journey inspires us to live fully and embrace every day. Happy birthday! A full century of wisdom and wonder. Thank you for showing us how beautiful life can be. Your century of life is proof that a kind heart and strong spirit can make the world a better place. One hundred years of making memories, spreading joy, and uplifting others. What a legacy! The pages of your life are filled with courage, compassion, and stories we’ll share for generations. 100 years of making every moment count. Your life is an inspiration to all who are lucky to know you. Age is just a number, and you prove that every day. Keep shining bright and inspiring those around you! Thank you for being a living reminder that a life of purpose, gratitude, and compassion creates a lasting legacy. Your strength and determination have shaped a legacy that will continue to inspire generations. Happy 100th! Your life has been a beacon of love, wisdom, and joy for all who know you. Thank you for inspiring us to do better. You’ve shown us what it means to face challenges head-on and never give us. Thank you for being an inspiration! Happy 100th birthday to someone who only gets better with age. Here’s to many more incredible moments together! You’ve seen a century of change, but your kindness and strength have remained the same. Thank you for inspiring us all. You’ve touched more lives than you’ll ever know, and your spirit continues to inspire everyone around you. Happy 100th birthday! Your life is a powerful reminder that it’s not the number of years, but how you live them. Thank you for showing us what it means to live with heart and purpose.

steps.title: Congratulate them on reaching 100 with a short and celebratory message.
steps.content: Congratulate them on reaching 100 with a short and celebratory message. Sending a short and sweet message is one of the best ways to spread cheer, especially on a milestone birthday. Whether you’re writing a card or saying your wish in person, tell your loved one they’re doing amazing and wish them well for the next century. 100 looks fabulous on you! You’re a marvel at age 100. Cheers to 100 amazing years! You make 100 look spectacular! Happy birthday to a living treasure. Happy 100th to an absolute legend. 100 and thriving—what a milestone! One hundred never looked so good! One hundred years, one amazing soul. Celebrating 10 decades of awesomeness! Here’s to 100 candles and a million smiles. Here’s to a century of grace and greatness! You’re still shining brighter than ever at 100! Centennial wishes for a truly special person. Wishing you life’s finest things. Happy 100th! 100? You don’t look a day over GORGEOUS! What a gift your 100 years have been to us all. Have a happy 100th birthday. You’ve earned it! Happy 100th birthday to the most beautiful soul. Wishing you a day as special as your 100 years. You’re a timeless inspiration. Happy 100th birthday! If you’re the new face of 100, it’s going to be stunning. You have so much to be proud of at 100. Enjoy today! A century of love, laughter, and legacy. Cheers to you! 100 years of warmth, wisdom, and wit—what an incredible journey! One hundred years young, and still as radiant, vibrant, and full of life as ever!

steps.title: Crack a joke about getting older to brighten their 100th birthday.
steps.content: Crack a joke about getting older to brighten their 100th birthday. Trying to add a touch of humor to your wishes? Throw in a playful joke about aging to make the birthday boy or girl smile. It’s the perfect way to lift their spirits and celebrate a momentous occasion like a 100th birthday. 100? You don’t look a day over 99 and a half! 100 years young…and still not acting your age! You’re not old, you’re vintage! Happy 100 years! Born before sliced bread…and still the best thing since! Turning 100 means you’re basically a time traveler now. Your candles cost more than the cake now. What a moment! If you were a car, you’d be a classic…and probably worth a fortune! You’re 100 and still kicking…just maybe not too high. Happy birthday! You’ve seen it all, done it all… and probably can’t remember most of it! You’ve officially earned the right to nap whenever you want. Happy 100th! Happy birthday, old man. Don’t forget to iron out the wrinkles in your birthday suit. You’re a walking history book…with a great sense of humor. Happy 100th birthday! You’ve been around so long, your first selfie was probably painted. Happy birthday! Happy 100th birthday! I kept the receipt for your gift, just in case you didn’t make it! You were born before Google, smartphones, and streaming. How did you survive?! You’re more fun than two 50-year-olds—and a hell of a lot smarter! Happy birthday! At 100, you’ve outlived almost everyone…so you automatically win every argument. Cheers to 100 years of greatness (or at least 80 great years and 20 that were meh)! If age is just a number, then you’ve clearly been hoarding them. Happy 100th birthday! Here’s to another year of losing things, forgetting names, and enjoying senior discounts! Turning 100 is a piece of cake…that's now too hard to chew because you forgot your dentures. Enjoy your day! At 100, you have a lifetime of experience and wisdom. So, you're basically like a fine wine...just a little more aged. You’re approximately thirty-six thousand, five-hundred and twenty-four days old. Turning 100 doesn’t sound so bad anymore, right? You’re never too old to blow out candles on a birthday cake, but we might need to keep a fire extinguisher handy this year. Happy 100th! Congratulations on reaching a century of life! You’ve officially earned the right to do and say whatever you want. At this point, who’s going to stop you?

steps.title: Highlight your grandmother’s timeless beauty, wisdom, and grace.
steps.content: Highlight your grandmother’s timeless beauty, wisdom, and grace. Take a moment to think about your grandmother’s role in your life, whether it’s the sacrifices she made for your parents or the invaluable lessons she taught you growing up. Specify what you love about her, or write a witty message to honor her 100-year legacy. May your birthday be filled with unexpected joys. Happy 100th, Grams! Wishing you 100 hugs for your 100 years, Nana. You deserve every single one. Happy 100th birthday to a grandmother who has the world’s greatest grandchild! Here’s to a century of being the world’s best grandma. We’re so lucky to call you ours! 100 years of grace, sweetness, and strength. You are an absolute treasure, Grandma. Wishing the softest soul a happy 100th birthday. You’re loved beyond words, Grandma. Your gentle spirit has touched generations, Grams. Here’s to a beautiful 100th birthday! Nana, your life has been a long, sweet song…and we’ve loved every note of it. Happy 100th! No one watches TV with their eyes closed better than you. Happy 100th birthday, Grams! Grandma, you are a true treasure in my life. Wishing you a 100th birthday as sweet as you are! You mean everything to me, Grandma. I hope you have the most spectacular 100th birthday! Nana, you’ve made a lifetime of love look so easy. What a joy to celebrate your 100th birthday! Every year with you has been a blessing, Grandma. Here’s to your 100th year of being amazing! Centennial wishes to the greatest hugger, storyteller, and baker in the world. Love you, Grammy! Grandma, you’re the sweetest part of every memory. Wishing you joy on this incredible milestone! Your love has been the thread that’s held our family together for a century. Happy 100th, Grandma! Your heart has made this family what it is today, Wishing you a day as lovely as your century of life. Your life’s journey is an inspiration to us all, Grandma. May your 100th birthday be a milestone of joy, wonder, and celebration! A grandmother’s love is a treasure that warms our hearts, and today, we celebrate the beautiful soul who inspires us. Happy 100th birthday! Grams, your unconditional love has been a pillar of strength in my life for many years. I hope your 100th birthday is just as wonderful as you are. When I look into your eyes, I see someone who’s lived an exciting and wondrous life. I hope to tread the same path as you, and wish you a very special 100th birthday. Grandma, you taught me to count my blessings, and one of them will always be you. We share a bond I will forever cherish, and I hope you have the most beautiful birthday! I’ve never met someone who’s the perfect balance of warmth, wisdom, and affection. You’re my role model for life, and I would do anything to make you smile. Happy 100th, Grandma! You are the perfect example of what we should strive to become. Thank you for setting such a high standard and teaching us the important things in life. Enjoy your 100th birthday, Grams! Happy 100th birthday, Nana. This family wouldn’t have gotten this far without your love and guidance, and we cannot imagine our lives without you. Thank you for everything, and have the best day!

steps.title: Remind your grandpa how important he is on his milestone birthday.
steps.content: Remind your grandpa how important he is on his milestone birthday. If you want to make your grandpa feel cherished on the big day, highlight his best qualities and share gratitude for all he’s done for your family. Here are some warm and witty wishes to express how much he means to you: 100 years young and still cracking jokes. We love you, Gramps! Every wrinkle tells a story of laughter and love. Happy 100th birthday, Grandpa! May your 100th birthday be as warm and cozy as your favorite chair. Enjoy today! I count myself very lucky to have you, Grandpa. Have a very happy 100th birthday! Your love has been a gentle place to land on for 100 years. Happy birthday, Grandpa. You’re the melody that makes our family song sweet. Have a beautiful 100th birthday! Happy 100th birthday to the grandpa whose wisdom is the compass that guides us all. Grandpa, your 100 years have built a foundation of love that will carry on forever. Happy birthday! It’s time to celebrate every moment of the amazing life you’ve lived. Happy 100th, Gramps! One hundred years of love wrapped in the warmest heart. Thanks for being you, Grandad. A century of love, strength, and stories that make our family whole. Happy birthday, Grandpa! To the grandpa who can fall asleep anywhere, I hope your 100th birthday is as relaxing as your naps! You’ve been our guide, rock, and storyteller for a century. Thank you for all the love you’ve shared. Only a grandpa as amazing as you could have a grandchild as amazing as me. Happy 100th birthday! Happy 100th birthday, Grandpa! May your day be filled with the same comfort and joy you bring us all. 100 years of loving, giving, and being absolutely amazing. You’re a blessing beyond words, Grandpa. Your gentle heart and strong spirit have shaped our family in the best ways. Happy 100th, Grandad! Gramps, your life is a masterclass in strength, kindness, and resilience. Happy 100th birthday to our hero. Grandpa, you're my hero, and I can only hope someday my grandkids see me the way I see you. Happy 100th. Wishing a very special 100th birthday to my fantastic grandpa. May this year bring you happiness and fulfillment! Grandad, your birthday is the one time of year you can act your shoe size, and not your age. Hope it’s a great one! Grandpa, your century of life isn’t just a milestone…it’s a treasure chest of memories we’ll cherish forever. Here’s to you! Happy 100th birthday to the heart of our family. You’ve taught me the meaning of love, strength, and integrity, and I’m so lucky to call you my grandpa. Thank you for everything. I’ve said it one time and I’ll say it again: I have the coolest grandpa in the world. You have the most incredible stories and advice, and I’m so lucky to be related to you. Keep shining and enjoy this new century, Gramps! People say kindness runs in my genes, and when I look at you, I know where I got it from. Thank you for leading by example and showing me what it means to be a good person. I hope this milestone birthday is extra special!

steps.title: Send your mom love and gratitude for her 100th birthday.
steps.content: Send your mom love and gratitude for her 100th birthday. The best way to honor your mom’’s milestone birthday is to stress how important she is to you and others. Explain how her kindness, empathy, and grace has made the world a better place, and thank her for supporting you throughout the years. Here are some thoughtful examples to tug at her heartstrings: 100 years old and still the life of the party. Happy birthday, Mom! Happy 100th, Mom. You have no clue how much I look up to you. You’re the best parent in the entire world. Happy 100th birthday, Ma! Happy 100th birthday to the woman who taught me love and perseverance. Happy 100th birthday, Mommy. I’m grateful for every moment we’ve shared. 100 looks incredible on you, Mom. You’ve aged with such beauty and grace. 100 years, and you’re still the queen of our hearts. Happy birthday, Mama Bear! Happy 100th to a wonderful mom, dear friend, and constant inspiration. I love you! A hundred years of being the heart and soul of our family. We are so lucky to have you. 100 candles for 100 incredible years of being the most incredible mom anyone could ask for. Happy 100th birthday, Mama. May your day be free of back pain and full of chocolate cake! Of all the moms in the world, I’m so grateful that I got you. I hope your 100th birthday is unforgettable! A hundred years of raising me right, and what a journey it has been! Thank you for everything, Mom. Happy 100th birthday to the strongest and most beautiful woman I’ve ever known. I’m so grateful to be your child. As you turn 100, please know you’re loved and valued by us all. We hope you get everything you wish for and more! May this milestone reflect the joy you’ve brought into our lives and the beautiful legacy you’ve created. We love you, Mom! Happy 100th birthday, Mama. I hope your birthday is as bright as your smile, as sweet as your love, and as wonderful as you are. One hundred years of being an incredible mom, friend, and all-around superstar…what’s your secret, and is it available in stores?! They say mothers are the greatest gift of all…and you’re living proof that it’s true! Happy 100th birthday to my one and only mother. Your love has been the guiding light of our family, and today we celebrate the remarkable woman you are. Cheers to 100 years! Mom, if it weren’t for you, I wouldn’t be the person I am. Thanks for being an amazing role model and guiding me through life. Happy birthday! Happy birthday, Mom! If 100 is the new 80, does that mean I get to knock a few years off my own age, too? Let’s agree to age backward together! You’re not just a parent—you’re a superhero, a role model, and my biggest inspiration. I love you more than words can describe, and I hope you have the best birthday! You’re 100! That means you now have an all-access pass to say whatever you want, spoil yourself, and pretend not to hear things you don’t like. Enjoy this new perk! If it weren’t for you, Mom, I wouldn’t be the person I am today. Thank you for being such an important part of my life and loving me unconditionally. Here’s to a century of you!

steps.title: Craft a heartfelt birthday wish to make your dad feel moved.
steps.content: Craft a heartfelt birthday wish to make your dad feel moved. If your dad is a huge inspiration or influence in your life, let it be known in your birthday message. Being vulnerable can help you connect with him on a deeper level and make his 100th birthday extra special. Happy 100th birthday to my hero. Let’s make it a day to remember! Here’s to 100 years of wisdom, laughter, and unforgettable dad jokes! A century of being the rock of our family. Thank you for everything, Dad. You’ve given our family 100 years of heart. What an amazing gift you are. Peace, love, and good health—all my best wishes on your 100th birthday, Pa. It’s great to see you in such good health as you turn ancient, Dad. Happy 100th! To the man who’s taught me everything, happy 100th birthday, and thank you for it all. Happy 100th birthday to the man I look up to most (even though I’m technically taller)! Happy 100th birthday, Dad! For mom’s sake, I’m praying you don’t party too hard today. Dad, I’m not saying you’re old, but your birth certificate is in hieroglyphics. Happy 100th! A hundred years of being a great father, mentor, and friend. Thank you for every moment. Thank you for every story, every hug, and every lesson over the last century. Happy birthday, Dad. Celebrating the man who gave me so much more than life. Thank you for a hundred years of love, Dad. Happy 100th, Daddy! You’re like a classic car—vintage, valuable, and in need of a little extra maintenance! Daddy, thank you for always showing me the right path. You will always be my hero. Happy 100th birthday! Wishing you the most amazing and memorable 100th birthday, Dad. I don’t know anyone who deserves it more than you do. Happy 100th birthday, Dad. Your strength, love, and wisdom have shaped my world, and I’m forever grateful to be your child. On your 100th birthday, I wanted to let you know how much you mean to me and how lucky I feel to have you in my life. I love you, Pops! Dad, you’ve given your heart to your family for a century…and we are better because of you. Thank you for everything, and enjoy your special day! As each year passes, I realize just how lucky I am to have such a wonderful father like you. I hope your 100th birthday is as fun and incredible as you! Happy 100th to my hero, my best friend, and my biggest supporter. I’m so grateful for all the time we’ve spent together, and I’m so lucky to call you my dad. I love you! Having a dad like you has made my life so much happier and more complete. I’ve learned so much from you, and I treasure every moment and lesson. Happy 100th! Happy 100th birthday, Dad. Thank you for all the sacrifices you’ve made for our family. I know I can’t ever repay you, but I’ll do my best to make you proud. Enjoy your day! Happy 100th birthday, Daddy. Congratulations on making it this far and being such an inspiration to us all. I’m so excited for this next chapter in your life, and I can’t wait to hear about all your adventures! Dad, you taught me everything I know—how to tie my shoes, how to ride a bike, how to choose a good beer, how to be a good partner, and how to chase my dreams. Thank you for everything, and have the most amazing 100th birthday!

steps.title: Show a woman turning 100 that she’s loved, valued, and incredible.
steps.content: Show a woman turning 100 that she’s loved, valued, and incredible. Whether you’ve known her for 15 or 50 years, it’s always a great idea to praise the wit, wisdom, and vigor that only 100 years of life can bring. Highlight your special bond with some sweet and sentimental words, and don’t forget to mention how stunning she is! Here’s to the queen of 100, crown and all! You’re a hundred years of pure sweetness! 100 and still making life look fun. You’re unstoppable! Still rocking it after a century. Please share your secrets! Cheers to 100 years of beauty, inside and out. Happy birthday! You made it to the century mark in style. Congrats on turning 100! A lifetime of love in one incredible woman. Happy 100th, beautiful. Here’s to a century of sugar, spice, and the spunkiest lady around! You’ve officially outlasted every trend. Happy 100th to a fashion icon! You’ve been lighting up lives for an entire century. Keep shining, birthday girl! 100 and still fabulous. Who needs anti-aging cream when you’ve got this glow? One hundred years of elegance, warmth, and wisdom. You are truly one of a kind! You’ve been fabulous for 100 years, and I’m sure you’ll keep it up for another 100! You’re not just aging gracefully, you’re setting the standard for what 100 should look like! Cheers to 100 beautiful years. Wishing you all the happiness you deserve in this new century! Congratulations on reaching 100, my dear. You’re like a fine wine, only getting better with time! Your age is a testament to the strength and resilience that reside within you. Happy 100th, darling! For 100 years, you’ve lived with purpose, grace, and an open heart. Today, we celebrate every part of you. Your sharp wit and timeless beauty have lit up rooms for a century. Happy 100th birthday, lovely lady! Celebrating 100 years of the most remarkable woman I know. It’s been such a privilege to call you my friend. In honor of your birthday, I had a facelift…so I could look surprised at your party. Happy 100th birthday, stunner! Sending endless love to you on this milestone birthday. Thank you for being a shining example of a life well-lived! Happy 100th birthday to a woman who’s beautiful inside and out. You’ve made the world brighter for an entire century! Wishing a woman of unmatched elegance and never-ending compassion a wonderful 100th birthday. You are one in a million! It’s not the number of candles on your cake. It’s the smiles you bring…and you bring even more than you’ll ever know. Happy 100th birthday, beautiful!

steps.title: Acknowledge his achievements to make him feel good on the big day.
steps.content: Acknowledge his achievements to make him feel good on the big day. A lot can happen in a single year, let alone 100 years, so take the opportunity to celebrate everything the birthday boy has accomplished. You could highlight specific milestones, such as getting married or starting a family, or simply remind him that he should be proud of making it this far. 100 years of wisdom, wit, and unbeatable charm! You’re not 100…you’re 18 with 82 years of experience! A century of life and still making it look easy. Happy 100th! You’re 100 years old and still outdoing us all. Happy birthday! Happy 100th to a man who has touched so many hearts with his life. 100 years young and at the top of your game. Happy birthday, old sport! 100 years of living, learning, and leading. What a legacy you’ve created! A century of life is certainly something to celebrate. Happy birthday, bud! A century of life…and still the sharpest man in the room. Happy birthday! You have so much to be proud of at 100. Congrats and enjoy your special day! Age is just a number, but 100 is a pretty darn big number. Enjoy your special day! To grow old is to become a classic of human existence. Happy 100 years of history! One hundred looks good on you! Here’s to all the greatness you bring into the world. Who needs 100 candles when your spirit burns brighter than them all? Happy birthday! They say a man’s age is just a number, so you’re just a really big kid at heart! Happy 100th! Happy 100th to a charming, intelligent, and all-around awesome man. It takes one to know one! Wishing you a joyful 100th birthday filled with all the love and admiration you deserve. You’ve earned it. I’ve watched you create an amazing life with a beautiful family. Congratulations on 100 years, my friend! You’ve spent a century uplifting others and leading with kindness. What an incredible journey it’s been! You are not one year older than last year, but one year younger than next year. Enjoy the happiest day today! Well, would you look at that—you’ve managed to hit another milestone. Happy 100th to an absolute legend! May happiness increase 100 times. May you never lack love, hope, and youth in your heart. Enjoy your 100 years! I want to wish a happy birthday to this man who just turned 100 but has a younger mind than anyone else. Congratulations! Happy 100th birthday to my oldest friend. Thank you for having my back, from college to now. Words can’t describe how much I treasure our friendship. 100 years of good times and great company. You’ve got so much to show for your time here on earth…and the best is yet to come! I hope each day is as happy and joyous as this one.

steps.title: Share a meaningful quote about aging to celebrate a 100th birthday.
steps.content: Share a meaningful quote about aging to celebrate a 100th birthday. Struggling to find the right sentiments? Get help from someone else to share your well wishes and honor a century of life! Whether you opt for something funny, inspirational, or heartwarming, it’s sure to make them feel cared for : “Youth has no age.” —Pablo Picasso “You don't get older, you get better." —Shirley Bassey “The older I get, the better I used to be.” —Leo Trevino “Gray hair is the glory of a long life.” – Lailah Gifty Akita “The first hundred years are the hardest.” — Wilson Mizner “An old young man will be a young old man.” —Benjamin Franklin “We turn not older with years, but newer every day.” —Emily Dickinson “Nice to be here? At my age, it’s nice to be anywhere.” —George Burns “Old age is always fifteen years older than I am.” —Oliver Wendell Holmes “Old age isn’t so bad when you consider the alternative.” —Maurice Chevalier “The older you get, the better you get. Unless you are a banana.” —Betty White “You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” —Les Brown “Whatever with the past has gone, the best is always yet to come.” — Lucy Larcom “You know you’re getting old when the candles cost more than the cake” —Bob Hope “I don’t feel old. I don’t feel anything until noon. Then it’s time for my nap.” —Bob Hope "You know you’ve aged when you read events you lived in a history book." ―Will Ferrell “Age is strictly a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.” —Jack Benny “We grow neither better nor worse as we get old, but more like ourselves.” —Bernard Baruch "The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age." ―Lucille Ball “I was brought up to respect my elders, so now I don’t have to respect anybody.” —George Burns “Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years” —Ausonius “Eventually you reach a point when you stop lying about your age and start bragging about it.” —Will Rogers “Today is the oldest you have been and the youngest you will ever be again. Make the most of it!” —Nicky Gumbel “You’ve heard of the three ages of man: Youth, middle age, and you’re looking wonderful.” —Cardinal Spellman “As you get older three things happen. The first is your memory goes, and I can’t remember the other two.” —Sir Norman Wisdom

steps.title: Express how blessed you are to know such an incredible person.
steps.content: Express how blessed you are to know such an incredible person. Birthdays are a wonderful opportunity to celebrate loved ones and thank God for putting them in your life. Turn to a birthday prayer , blessing, or Bible verse to share your love and gratitude, or let the birthday boy or girl know you’re praying for them on their milestone birthday. “Thanks be to God for his indescribable gift!” —2 Corinthians 9:15 “With long life I will satisfy him and show him my salvation.” —Psalm 91:16 Praying for you on this special occasion. I hope you feel the Lord’s light and joy! His love comes in all kinds of packages—big, small, and you-sized! Happy 100th! I hope your 100th birthday is filled with endless blessings. Enjoy your special day! When I look at you, I see a person created in God’s image. Happy 100th birthday! May his light shine upon you and guide you every step of the way. Happy birthday! I pray the Lord’s blessings shower over you today—and every day. Here’s to 100 years! Trust in His promise for another year of peace and prosperity and it will surely come to you! “May he give you the desire of your heart and make all your plans succeed.” —Psalm 20:4 Here’s to many more blessed years together. Happy 100th birthday to the kindest person I know. Heavenly Father, grant my loved one the gift of peace, love, and prosperity on their birthday. God has gifted you with another year of life. Please continue to grow in his love and devotion. “For through wisdom your days will be many, and years will be added to your life.” —Proverbs 9:11 The heavens are filled with joy because it’s your 100th birthday. Prayers for a healthy and happy year ahead! May the Lord continue to bless you with peace, love, and joy as you celebrate this incredible milestone of 100 years. Lord, bless my loved one with a year full of good health and exciting opportunities. May they always be surrounded by your love. Every breath you take is a testament to his greatness. Embrace each moment with confidence and grace. Happy 100th birthday! There are no birthday gifts as glorious as the one God gave you on the day you were born. Blessings be with you and let faith guide your heart all year. Today, we celebrate one of God’s greatest creations…YOU! Happy 100th birthday to an honest, humble, and devoted man/woman. You mean everything to us. You’ve shown us what it means to live a good Christian life, and for that, we’ll be forever grateful. May your 100th be filled with boundless light, love, and positivity. Dear Lord, remind (birthday person’s name) on their big day of your promises, which are steadfast and true. Strengthen their faith and help them walk closer with you. “Even to your old age and gray hairs I am he, I am he who will sustain you. I have made you and I will carry you; I will sustain you and I will rescue you.” —Isaiah 46:4 I told God you’re incredible, but he already knew it. So, I asked him to bless you even more! I pray this new century is even more joyous than the last. Happy birthday! If you remember that every day is a gift from God, you’ll never worry about getting older. Happy 100th birthday to a very special person—I can’t wait to see what blessings He brings you.

steps.title: What is a person celebrating their 100th birthday called?
steps.content: What is a person celebrating their 100th birthday called? A person who is 100 years old or older is known as a centenarian. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Why is turning 100 such a big deal?
steps.content: Why is turning 100 such a big deal? Turning 100 is considered a huge milestone because only a small fraction of people (about one in every 5,000) live that long. [2] X Research source It’s a symbol of longevity, resilience, great genes, and a life well-lived, especially since many centenarians are grandparents or great-grandparents who have impacted generations.

steps.title: What do people get when they turn 100?
steps.content: What do people get when they turn 100? In the United States, you can request a congratulatory card or letter from the President. [3] X Research source To get your birthday card , visit the White House contact page , input your contact details, and write a brief message that you’re requesting a presidential greeting in honor of your 100th birthday.

steps.title: How do you honor someone turning 100?
steps.content: How do you honor someone turning 100? The easiest way to show love and appreciation is to write them a sincere birthday message that conveys the impact they’ve had on your life. You can also throw a huge birthday party with all their friends and family, or give them a thoughtful gift that celebrates their life. Here are some examples: Make a short film about their life Give them a memory book or legacy journal Surprise them with a custom portrait from their favorite photo Fill a jar with 100 reasons why they’re loved from family members Commission a small donation, scholarship, or charitable gift in their name

steps.title: How can I personalize a 100th birthday message?
steps.content: How can I personalize a 100th birthday message? Reflect on your relationship and favorite memories with the birthday boy or girl, then write a heartfelt message about their life and legacy. You could emphasize their best qualities, highlight their accomplishments, or remind them how lucky you feel to know them. As long as you craft a message that comes from your heart, it’s sure to be memorable and appreciated!
